short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: export ChagtGPT conversation to txt, png, markdown, pdf and so on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A ChatGPT conversation export plugin, can export and download the ChatGPT conversation, support multiple formats.

* Supported formats

Export ChatGPT to Text
Export ChatGPT to PNG
Export ChatGPT to Markdown
Export ChatGPT to PDF


* Tips for use

1. Open ChatGPT web site: https://chat.openai.com.
2. The ExportGPT plugin will place a button on the right side of the page, choose and click the format you want to export.
